text: La Fouly is a village of the canton of Valais in Switzerland. La Fouly is in the municipality of Orsi√®res. It sits at the foot of Mont Dolent (3,823 m) and the Tour Noir (3,836m) in the Mont Blanc massif. == Other websites == * Official website * La Fouly myswitzerland.com Category:Villages in Valais Category:Entremont District
